Description: Spacious 2 bed 1 bath, centrally located in Dorchester. 2 full size bedrooms, living room, eat-in kitchen, and a back porch! This unit is de-leaded. Great opportunity to get everything you are looking for in the city with quick access to the highway as well as public transportation. Minutes from Dorchester Ave + Shawmut train station! Washer/Dryer hookup in basement. Please text the cell phone number attached directly to book a showing.
